scene_description_enriched: A man and a woman embrace tenderly outside a small building. The woman, wearing a blue tunic and a white veil, is embraced by a man in a red robe and a blue hat. They are positioned in front of a simple wooden door set into a light-colored building with a brown roof. Behind them, a wooden fence encloses a green, hilly landscape under a blue sky. The scene likely depicts a moment of affection or reunion, possibly related to a biblical or devotional narrative.
